Description: EVH WOLFGANG SPECIAL Guitar - in a Vintage White Color with EVH Striped Series Case. The guitar is nicely built and comes with a high-quality maple neck and Floyd Rose Trem. The neck plays like butta. The Body is Arched top made of basswood, the humbuckers are incredible and sound great. The toggle switch sticks. Keys and Tools with Schaller Strap Locks. VINTAGE WHITE (THIS COLOR IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE), Guitar in EXCELLENT CONDITION...Buy It Now! I really like this guitar, but will be having surgery at the end of the year and need to sell all.
